text: Mortal Engines is a 2018 science fiction action adventure movie from Universal Pictures based on the 2001 novel of the same name by Philip Reeve. The film is set in a post-apocalyptic world where entire cities have been mounted on wheels and motorised, and practice municipal Darwinism. == Other websites == * * Category:2018 science fiction movies Category:2018 action movies Category:2018 adventure movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American action movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Science fiction action movies Category:New Zealand science fiction movies Category:New Zealand action movies Category:New Zealand adventure movies Category:Predator Cities Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Dystopian movies
title: Mortal Engines (movie)
